title: Tech - The Verge
content: The latest tech news about the world's best (and sometimes worst) hardware, apps, and much more. From top companies like Google and Apple to tiny startups vying for your attention, Verge Tech has the latest in what matters in technology daily. Would you give up your data in exchange for a free TV? The new standard’s spec isn’t done, but that won’t stop TP-Link from dropping a new Wi-Fi 7 mesh system and single AP router that can emote at you.
